title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.96 - Enforceability of final schedule prescribed pursuant to granting of variance or exemption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.96 - Enforceability of final schedule prescribed pursuant to granting of variance or exemption

State Regulations

Once a schedule prescribed pursuant to the granting of a variance under section
5-1.90
of this Subpart or an exemption under section
5-1.92
of this Subpart has become final pursuant to section
5-1.94
(e) of this Subpart, the conditions or requirements of any such schedule shall be enforceable, on the application of the commissioner, by any court of competent jurisdiction in the same manner as an order of the commissioner under section
1107
of the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.96

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
